dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: JEB-Perrard-2012-Caste-dimorphism
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Coordinates of the 19 landmarks from the right forewing of specimens used in the study, in a .NTS format. An associate table provide names, species, caste and geographic informations in a .NTS format.
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: Social wasps
Geometric Morphometrics
Allometry
Caste dimorphism
Wing shape
